name: FloatingWindowPosition
shortdesc: Options for specifying the position of a movie's display window.

property.name: UPPER_LEFT
property.shortdesc: Positions the window in the upper left corner of the screen.

property.name: UPPER_MIDDLE
property.shortdesc: Positions the window at the top of the screen midway between the left and right edges.

property.name: UPPER_RIGHT
property.shortdesc: Positions the window in the upper right corner of the screen.

property.name: CENTER_LEFT
property.shortdesc: Positions the window on the left side of the screen midway between the top and bottom.

property.name: CENTER
property.shortdesc: Positions the window in the center of the screen.

property.name: CENTER_RIGHT
property.shortdesc: Positions the window on the right side of the screen midway between the top and bottom.

property.name: LOWER_LEFT
property.shortdesc: Positions the window in the lower left corner of the screen.

property.name: LOWER_MIDDLE
property.shortdesc: Positions the window at the bottom of the screen midway between the left and right edges.

property.name: LOWER_RIGHT
property.shortdesc: Positions the window in the lower right corner of the screen.
